column2: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] thinks humans are superior to other races. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Racist trait.
Humans are the superior race. I've gained the Racist tarit.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] sees all races as equal. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Tolerant trait.
Deep down all the races are the same. I've gained the Tolerant trait.
